message: I propose a fair split, with me taking 90% and you taking 10%.  This way, we both get something, and we don't have to waste time with more rounds.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you 300,000, which is a good deal considering the money will be worth less if you make me wait.
I'm willing to give you a little more, but I'm not going to give in completely.  Take 200,000, or we'll keep going and see how much you actually lose with each round.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Accept this offer of 400,000 for you, or I'm going to start being much less generous. The clock is ticking, and it's costing me money!
